He checked the intelligence the High Command had given him. Whatever 
planet they would find beyond that wormhole would probably not provide 
any permanent settlement. A orbital drop was then in order.

Yggdrasil Prime: That leaves us with the Bullet, then.

The Bullet was a sleek ship not made for atmospheric entry. It was the 
best for launching troops onplanet and providing limited firepower 
from orbit.

Yggdrasil: Where the heck are those clowns? (He reopened a channel to 
the planet) Botanica, got any news?

Botanica: Negative sir. I did send the announcement. They're not there 
yet?

Yggdrasil: No [There is a close-up zoom on his face. He has a 
furious-looking expression] Patch me through.

Reuctantly, Botanica pushes the button.

All the speakers in the small Maximal outpost boom to life.

Yggdrasil: WHAT ARE YOU SLAGGIN' PIECES OF SCRAP STILL DOING DOWN 
THERE? WHEN I CALL UP THE IRON SQUAD I WANT THEM UP IN A MATTER OF 
CYCLES! REPORT NOW OR I'LL KICK YOUR CIRCUITS BACK UP MYSELF!
